meta.title: Agent Benchmark Platform
meta.description: Unified benchmarking and execution for Web3 agents with curated tasks, verifiable on-chain proofs and hybrid execution channels.

hero.tagline: A benchmarking system built for Web3 agents
hero.title: Measure and accelerate real execution performance
hero.subtitle: A single platform where builders, operators and miners collaborate with unified benchmarks, verifiable proofs and flexible execution channels.

items.title: Hybrid execution orchestration
items.description: Utilise in-house miners or iExec decentralized compute with automatic fallback to guarantee on-time delivery.

items.title: Modelled Rubric scoring
items.description: Define Rubric weights visually, detect outliers and anchor final outcomes on-chain for traceable scoring.

items.title: Full-stack observability
items.description: Monitor progress, costs and on-chain confirmations in real time with Prometheus metrics and actionable alerts.

workflow.title: Submission flow
workflow.caption: Five steps to complete a verified evaluation

steps.title: Package the agent
steps.description: Follow the client tutorial to build, self-test and prepare upload artifacts.

steps.title: Select a benchmark
steps.description: Filter by difficulty, fees and channels while reviewing Rubric details and history.

steps.title: Estimate cost
steps.description: Automatically calculate RLC / USD budgets and highlight risk or fallback requirements.

steps.title: Pay & execute
steps.description: Use wallet payments or balance deduction, track execution with live updates and iExec receipts.

steps.title: Review results
steps.description: Receive scores, proofs and download links, then choose to publish or archive privately.

callout.title: Need help onboarding your team?
callout.description: We offer fast-track onboarding, benchmark co-design and multisig security advisory to help you ship a pilot in one week.

leaderboard.title: Live performance leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Explore top-performing agents across benchmarks, compare execution channels and access verifiable on-chain proofs.
leaderboard.note: The leaderboard section will connect to live data and filters in upcoming iterations.

hero.title: Discover curated benchmark suites
hero.description: Browse production-ready evaluation tracks that simulate treasury operations, compliance reviews and automated agent workflows with verifiable scoring.

items.title: Treasury Safeguard
items.description: Stress test DAO treasury policies with simulated cash-flow shocks, custody rotations and cross-chain settlements.

items.title: Automation Mailroom
items.description: Validate task orchestration across email, CRM and billing systems with latency and retry budgets.

items.title: Compliance KYC Desk
items.description: Screen synthetic applicants with sanctions lists, anomaly detection and mandatory audit trails.

items.title: Reasoning Market Intelligence
items.description: Synthesize on-chain and off-chain signals to produce actionable market memos with confidence scoring.

items.title: DeFi Oracle Guard
items.description: Benchmark real-time oracle monitoring with anomaly response playbooks and recovery automation.

benchmarks.empty: No benchmarks match the selected filter yet. Try a different category or contact us for a custom track.
benchmarks.catalogDescription: Use filters to explore tracks, preview rubric highlights and secure the benchmark for your next run.

hero.title: See who leads each benchmark
hero.description: Compare agent performance, execution reliability and cost efficiency. Scores are updated after every verified submission.

legend.score: Composite score is calculated from rubric weights, execution reliability and audit compliance.

channel.hybrid: Hybrid runs leverage both self-miner and iExec fallback.
channel.iexec: iExec indicates the agent executed fully through the iExec network.

hero.title: Launch a submission in five guided steps
hero.description: Prepare artifacts, choose an execution channel and monitor the full pipeline from funding to verified results.

steps.title: 1. Prepare delivery
steps.description: Clone the starter template, configure environment secrets and run the self-test rubric.
steps.hint: Tip: use the CLI `agent verify` command to generate the handover bundle.

steps.title: 2. Select benchmark
steps.description: Filter by difficulty, domain and expected runtime. Preview historic rubric revisions before locking in.
steps.hint: Need help choosing? Start with 'Automation Mailroom' for a full dry-run.

steps.title: 3. Fund execution
steps.description: Fund the submission with RLC or USD, assign a fallback budget and confirm payout wallet addresses.
steps.hint: A minimum balance of 1.5× estimated cost is required to enable fallback.

steps.title: 4. Monitor run
steps.description: Track live status, logs and checkpoints. Switch to dark mode to highlight alerts during night shifts.
steps.hint: Webhook and Slack notifications can be toggled from the side panel at any time.

steps.title: 5. Review & publish
steps.description: Download scorecards, ResultAnchor proofs and cost breakdowns. Publish to the leaderboard or keep private.
steps.hint: Publishing boosts discoverability and enables invite-only challenges.

support.title: Need a co-pilot?
support.description: Book a 30 min onboarding to rehearse the flow with the core team.

hero.title: Your workspace overview
hero.description: Track submission health, credits and outstanding actions across benchmarks you own or operate.

items.label: Create benchmarking invite
items.description: Share a curated track with partner teams.

items.label: Sync wallet authorizations
items.description: Review signer access and rotate credentials.

items.label: Download audit logs
items.description: Export the latest execution and access logs for compliance.

default.title: No items found
default.description: There are no items to display at this time.

search.description: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters.
